    protected Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>
    fetchCacheData()
     
    Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>
    getByResidency(boolean hasTown)
    Similar to BaseCache.getAll(), this method gets all the players but only includes those that match a certain residential status indicated by the hasTown parameter.

    NOTE: If the intention is to call this method twice, once for townless and another for towned players, consider using getSorted() instead to sort them in a single forEach pass and avoid unnecessary operations.
    Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>
    getNearby(@NotNull SquaremapLocation location, Integer xRadius, Integer zRadius)

    getNearby(Integer xCoord, Integer zCoord, Integer xRadius, Integer zRadius)
     
    kotlin.Pair<Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>,Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>>
    getSorted()
    Gets online players and sorts them into two seperate maps in a single pass.
    A new Pair is returned, where the first contains players with a town and the second without.

    • fetchCacheData

      Specified by:

    • getByResidency

      public Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer> getByResidency(boolean hasTown)
      Similar to BaseCache.getAll(), this method gets all the players but only includes those that match a certain residential status indicated by the hasTown parameter.

      NOTE: If the intention is to call this method twice, once for townless and another for towned players, consider using getSorted() instead to sort them in a single forEach pass and avoid unnecessary operations.
      Parameters:
      hasTown - The residential status to filter by. True for residents, false for townless.
      Returns:
      The filtered map of online players that pass the hasTown value.

    • getSorted

      public kotlin.Pair<Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>,Map<String,SquaremapOnlinePlayer>> getSorted()
      Gets online players and sorts them into two seperate maps in a single pass.
      A new Pair is returned, where the first contains players with a town and the second without.
